title: Twisted Treeline Ranked Queue Times

embed.description: Running every Thursday from 3pm-1am AEDT, ranked Twisted Treeline offers fast, skirmish-heavy matches. Defeat turrets, capture altars and gank often in a two lane race to destroy the opposing team's Nexus.

body: From the preseason announcement, it was stated out "TT Ranked Flex will be enabled on Thursday during the hours of 03:00 PM to 01:00 AM AEDT the next day", yet it's hardly ever carried out on time. Was there another 'official' announcement after this that I'm missing regarding the uptimes of 'TT Ranked Flex'? I saw this post 'https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/FKbiy2gY-twisted-treeline-ranked-schedule-preseason-update' but have no idea if it's credible as I don't see a 'Riot' tag or tag of any kind next to his [Zaps] name . Although even if it was official, why isn't the schedule being followed then?

replies.body:
Hey Mystici,

Yea there was another announcement back in April about the times changing and the reasoning [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/b4EUvoMX-tt-changes-coming-apr-3rd).

You can always find the [current intended queue schedule](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-apr-3rd-2018) pinned to the [Boards home page](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/).
